p: The identification of the components was performed based on comparison of retention indices in literature [ 30]. For the retention index, the equation of van den Dool and Kratz [ 31] was used relative to a homologous series of n-alkanes (nC 9-nC 18). Three libraries of the equipment WILEY8, NIST107, and NIST21 were used, which allows data comparison of the spectra with those contained in the libraries using an 80% similarity index.
